variants.text: Gain direct exposure to active investors who are specifically looking for biotech and SynBio innovations. This is your chance to get in front of decision-makers who can actually write checks.
Pitching at our event gives you a platform to showcase your innovation to a room full of investors, potential partners, and media - all in one place.
Increase your visibility in the European biotech ecosystem. Past participants have secured funding, partnerships, and media coverage as a result of their participation.
Beyond potential funding, you'll receive valuable feedback from experienced judges and have the opportunity to refine your pitch in a supportive environment.
Participating companies will have exhibition space to showcase their technology and engage with attendees throughout the event.
